text: Yad Jemis, God ayɨp Bɨawl Jisas Klays ayɨp bɨ wog gɨñeb kɨli mɨdebin. Nɨbi binɨb Yislel jɨj anep umɨgan,1.1 Takaw anɨb ak, Yislel binɨb jɨj ak, takaw pal adaŋ lɨl agak. Jemis ne God binɨb ne mɨdupsek lum awl mɨdebal okok kɨlop nɨŋɨd, anɨb agak. man ke okok ju am mɨdebɨm okok, nɨbop mɨj tɨkebin. Mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb.
